directions: In a saucepan over medium heat, heat oil.  Cook green bell pepper and onion until tender, stirring often.
Add cream of chicken soup, broth, chili powder and cooked chicken.  Bring to a boil and then simmer for 10 minutes.
Add tomatoes and mixed vegetables.  Cook for 30 minutes and then serve.
ingredients: 1 (10.75 ounce) can  condensed cream of chicken soup
title: Chili Chicken Stew
